channel.title: Release Notes - 2019 on Releases - aspose.com
channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes - 2019 on Releases - aspose.com

item.title: Aspose.PSD for Java 19.12 - Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PSD for Java 19.12 Key Summary Category PSDJAVA-75 Add support of Linked Layer Feature PSDJAVA-72 Support of SoCoResource Feature PSDJAVA-66 If TextLayer is updated with string which contains LineBreaks, these LineBreaks are added to already existing LineBreaks but should replace them Bug PSDJAVA-67 Saving PSB as PNG freezing Bug PSDJAVA-68 Exception on loading Cmyk PSD file without layer with RLE compression Bug PSDJAVA-73 Exception on updating text layers Bug PSDJAVA-71 Resize of some PSD files with layer masks works incorrect Bug PSDJAVA-74 Saving PSD with some Globalization.

item.title: Aspose.PSD for Java 19.4 - Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PSD for Java 19.4 ** Key Summary Category PSDJAVA-1 Make feature to load JPEG/PNG/etc image files to PsdImage without direct loading(Which is not supported in Aspose.PSD) Feature PSDJAVA-2 Support of RGB Color mode with 16bits/channel (64 bits per color) Feature PSDJAVA-3 Support of Layer Vector Masks and Text Layer Custom FlipRotate Feature PSDJAVA-4 All Asian characters are not rendered properly Bug PSDJAVA-5 \r\n symbols are interpreted as double line break that is wrong Bug PSDJAVA-6 If TextLayer is updated with string which contains LineBreaks then PSD File become unreadable Bug PSDJAVA-7 If TextLayer is updated with string which contains Tabs symbols, processing fails with exception Bug Public API Changes Added APIs: M:Aspose.
